column4: Hi, if I need a printer driver (CUPS BJC8200), is there an easy way (i.e. synaptic) I can get it?
It doesn't have my printer (actually, it has models either side of mine (Canon i550))
The CUPS BJC8200 driver works with mine, just wondering if there' an easier way to get it, I don't want to download it and have to dick around.
